titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to make the Social Security Trustees Report process more accountable and transparent, and for other purposes.
Social Security Trustees Report Accountability, Transparency, and Improvement Act of 2018
Social Security Trustees Report Accountability, Transparency, and Improvement Act of 2018
Social Security Trustees Report Accountability, Transparency, and Improvement Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary:
Social Security Trustees Report Accountability, Transparency, and Improvement Act of 2018
This bill modifies the information that the Board of Trustees of the Trust Funds must report to Congress annually regarding the status of various Social Security-related trust funds.
